QuestData.Title: Report to the Denmother
QuestData.Description: With the goblins scattered and their equipment destroyed, they'll either get the message and leave, or be easy pickings if they choose to stay. We've won here.$B$BYou've fought as fiercely as any member of the pack, $n. Return to the Denmother and let her know of our success. I'll be maintaining my watch.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Denmother Ulrica at Talonbranch Glade.
QuestData.RewardText: Let the goblins and all the Horde know we will not have offers of peace and sanctuary abused... most of all not in our new home.$B$BI am grateful my people have found allies as bold as you, $n. This reward will represent your bond with our pack. You will always be welcome here.
